content.prompt: Assume that we have a class called Calculator that provides a method for performing the average operation. Complete the following Calculator class by writing a method called average that accepts two integer parameters and returns their average as a double.E.g. 1: if the first parameter of the average method is 3 and the second parameter of the average method is 6, the value returned by the average method will be 4.5.E.g. 2: if the first parameter of the average method is 10 and the second parameter of the average method is 2, the value returned by the average method will be 6.0.
content.source_code:

[blocked]
public class Calculator {

[/student_code]

}
[/blocked]
[/file]
